animal.title: rhino
animal.description: The white rhino has an immense body and large head, a short neck and broad chest.

animal.title: narwhal
animal.description: The narwhal is a medium-sized toothed whale that possesses a large 'tusk' from a protruding canine tooth.

animal.title: bull
animal.description: Cattle are large, domesticated, cloven-hooved, herbivores.

animal.title: unicorn
animal.description: The unicorn is a legendary creature that has been described since antiquity as a beast with a single large, pointed, spiraling horn projecting from its forehead.

animal.title: gazelle
animal.description: A gazelle is one of many antelope species in the genus Gazella.
